quotes.message: I try to remember, as I hear about friends getting engaged, that it's not about the ring and it's not about the wedding. It's a grave thing, getting married. And it's easy to get swept up in the wrong things.
quotes.name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.message: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: My instinct is to keep my engagement ring After all, I wouldn't like to see it on the finger of a cheeky girl.
quotes.name: Sian Lloyd

quotes.message: I won't give my heart to another girl until God shows me it's my wife.
quotes.name: Eric Ludy

quotes.message: Control leads to compliance; autonomy leads to engagement.
quotes.name: Daniel H. Pink

quotes.message: We may have started as individuals, but now we are as one.
quotes.name: Bryon Pulsifer

quotes.message: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
quotes.name: Antoine

quotes.message: Not men but measures a sort of charm by which many people get loose from every honorable engagement.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: There are many blanks left in the weeks of courtship, which a loving faith fills with happy assurance.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: You rose into my life like a promised sunrise, brightening my days with the light in your eyes. I've never been so strong. Now I'm where I belong.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: We start a relationship with someone not only because of how great they are but how great they make us feel. And because they have granted us this extraordinary giftâ€”a chance to experience love, joy, compassion, and security â€”it is our exclusive privilege to make them feel wonderful about themselves, especially during days when they, themselves, don't feel so wonderful.
quotes.name: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.message: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.name: Emily Bronte

quotes.message: If you want to sacrifice the admiration of many men for the criticism of one, go ahead, get married.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness - and call it love - true love.
quotes.name: Robert Fulghum

quotes.message: The Oriole weds his mottled mate, the Lily weds the bee; Heaven's marriage ring is round the earth, let me bind thee?
quotes.name: Victorian Card

quotes.message: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Engagement marks the end of a whirlwind romance and beginning of an eternal love story.
quotes.name: Rajeev Ranjan

quotes.message: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: It is good to have an end to journey toward; But it is the journey that matters, in the end.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: May your love for each other always shine brightly! Well wishes on your engagement!
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.name: Nora Ephron

quotes.message: All commands from your lips are sweet, I say, and now have you not said the sweetest of all? Marry you!
quotes.name: Byron Caldwell Smith

quotes.message: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances; if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: We have the greatest pre-nuptial agreement in the world. It's called love.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Find the person who will love you because of your differences and not in spite of them and you have found a lover for life.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: To love and to be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.name: David Viscott

quotes.message: Engagement marks the apex of a relationship's love and happiness. It's all downhill from here. Congratulations.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: I couldn't have dreamed you into existence because I didn't even know I needed you. You must have been sent to me.
quotes.name: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.message: It is the duty of the bride's father to give a party to announce the engagement. Apparently this is done only after everyone knows about it.
quotes.name: Spencer Tracy

quotes.message: An engagement should come upon a young girl as a surprise, pleasant or unpleasant as the case may be. It is hardly a matter she could be allowed to arrange for herself.
quotes.name: Edith Evans

quotes.message: No engagement is worth anything unless it has been broken at least once.
quotes.name: Dorothy Tutin

quotes.message: The disgusting way an engagement is regarded public property; all these older women smirking...but my point is their whole attitude is wrong— an engagement, horrid word in the first place, is a private affair and should be regarded as such.
quotes.name: Daniel Day-Lewis

quotes.message: An engaged woman is always more agreeable than a disengaged. She is satisfied with herself. Her cares are over, and she feels that may exert all her powers of pleasing without suspicion. All is safe with a lady engaged; no harm can be done.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: I would rather not be engaged. When people are engaged, they begin to thin of being married soon...and I should like everything to go on for a long while just as it is.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: To speak frankly, I'm not in favor of long engagements. They give people the opportunity of finding out each other's character before marriage, which I think is never advisable.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Courtship to marriage is a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
quotes.name: William Congreve

quotes.message: Today, engagement parties still allow both families to meet each other if they haven't done so before. Even if both sets of parents have met, it's nice for siblings and other extended relatives to meet and mingle so they are all acquainted with one another before the wedding.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Kaplan-Mayer

quotes.message: It's never out of style to have good manners. If possible, make the engagement announcement to the bride's parents in person.
quotes.name: Joyce Scardina-Becker

quotes.message: Although somewhat outdated, the use of formal announcement cards is a beautiful and elegant way to spread the word of your engagement.
quotes.name: Joyce Scardina-Becker

quotes.message: And how my anguish, when she drew her glove, .And showed the plain gold sign of wedded love, . Refused assuagement:— . Why is it that I do not care a jot . If this one wears such fateful ring, or not— .
quotes.name: James Brunton-Stephen

quotes.message: Herbert broke our engagement of eight years . When Annabelle returned to the village . From the Seminary, ah me! . If I had let my love for him alone . It might have grown into a beautiful sorrow.
quotes.name: Edgar Lee Masters

quotes.message: The best thing that the diamond ring could do; was to amicably occupy a place on the engagement finger,
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: If we don't break this off, there will be time enough . For that sort of thing; but the bargain must be, . That as long as I choose I am perfectly free: . For this is a sort of engagement, you see, . Which is binding on you, but not binding on me.
quotes.name: William Allen Butler

quotes.message: Once I was a King . Now I'm wrapped around her finger . Like a diamond ring . The engagement ring . The wedding ring . The church bells ring . And the suffering.
quotes.name: Stuart Phillips

quotes.message: Darling me and you, we had a strange arrangement . But you broke all the rules . And I'm through playing the fool for love . Darling yes it's true, we had a grand engagement . But I can't stand by, while you break my heart in two . Ooh, I've got to be a man . Baby I've got to take a stand, so.
quotes.name: Andrew M. Cohen

quotes.message: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: And I'd choose you; in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds, in any version of reality, I'd find you and I'd choose you.
quotes.name: Kiersten White

quotes.message: It is sometimes essential for a husband and a wife to quarrel—they get to know each other better.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfang Von Goethe

quotes.message: What greater thing is there for human souls than to feel that they are joined for life – to be with each other in silent unspeakable memories.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
quotes.name: Will Ferrell

quotes.message: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: Success in marriage does not come merely through finding the right mate, but through being the right mate.
quotes.name: Barnett R. Brickner

quotes.message: Engagement can be a commitment to love or a declaration of war. One must enter every battle without hesitation, willing to fully engage the enemy until death do you apart.
quotes.name: Emily Thorne

quotes.message: A perfect couple shares their failures, mistakes and their successes equally and deal with them all as a team.
quotes.name: Ricardo Derose
